response.overview: Rise of the Snakes (also titled Rise of the Serpentine on the DVD release) is the first season of the computer-animated television series Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu (titled Ninjago from the eleventh season onward). Michael Hegner and Tommy Andreasen created the series. It revolves around the adventures of four teenage ninja who live in the fictional world of Ninjago and fight against the forces of evil.[
response.title: Rise Of The Snakes
